verses.content: Chun, Benjamin chun a nau lutirah Bela a nei a, a pahninaa chun Asbel, a pathumnaah Ahara,
a palinaah Noha, a panganaah Rapha.
Chun, Bela chun naupasalhai a nei a, Addar, Gera le Abihud:
Abisua, Naaman, Ahoa;
Gera, Sephuphan le Huram an nih.
Hienghai hi Ehud naupasalhai chu an nih: Geba hluotuhai, an pa- hnama luhai an nih; anni chu Manahath-a chun an hnawthmang a.
Naaman le Ahija le Gera a hnawthmang a, Uzza le Abihud a nei a.
Chun, anni chu a tirhmang hnung chun Moab phûla khan Saha- raim chun nauhai a nei a; Husim le Baara hi a nuhmeihai an nih.
Chun, a nuhmei Hodes le chun Jobab, Zibia, Mesa, Malkam;
Jeuz, Sakia le, Mirma a nei a. Hienghai hi a naupasalhai, pahnam luhai chu an nih.
Husim le chun Abitub le Elpaal a nei a.
Elpaal naupasalhai chu: Eber, Misam le Semed, Ono le Lod le a vêla khuohai siemtu chu.
Beria le Sema, Aijalon ram hluotuhai laia an pahnam luhai Gath hluotuhai intlânsiettirtuhai chu;
Ahio, Sasak le Jeremoth;
Zebadia, Arad le Eder;
Mikael, Ispah le Joha, Beria naupasalhai chu.
Zebadia, Mesullam, Hizki, Heber,
Ismerai, Izlia, Jobab, Elpaal naupasalhai chu.
Jakim, Zikri, Zabdi
Elienai, Zillethai, Eliel;
Adaia, Beraia, Simrat, Simei naupasalhai chu
Ispan, Eber, Eliel,
Abdon, Zikri, Hanan,
Hanania, Elam, Antothija
Iphedeia, Penuel, Sasak naupa- salhai chu;
Chun, Samserai, Seharia, Athalia;
Jaaresia, Elija le Zikri, Jeroham naupasalhai chu.
Hienghai hi mi langsârtak le an pahnama ṭhang po poa luhai chu an nih; annihai chu Jerusalemah an um a nih.
Chun, Gibeona chun Gibeon pa Jeiel chu a chêng a, a nuhmei hming chu Maaka a na;
a nau lutîr chu Abdon, Zura, Kis, Baal, Nadab,
Gedor, Ahio le Zeker.
Chun, Mikloth chun Simea a nei a, anni khawm chu an unauhai epin, an unauhai kâwlah Jerusalema chun an chêng veh a.
Nera chun Kis chu a nei a; Kis chun Saula a nei a; chun, Saula chun Jonathan a nei a, Malkisua le Abinadab le Es-baal leh.
Chun, Jonathan naupa chu Merib-baal a na; Merib-baal chun Mika a nei a.
Mika naupasalhai chu: Pithon, Melek, Tarea le Ahaz an nih.
Ahaz chun Jehoadda a nei a, Jehoadda chun Alemeth, Azmaveth le Zimri a nei a; chun, Zimri chun Moza a nei a:
Moza chun Binea a nei a; ama naupa chu Rapha a na, ama naupa chu Eleasa a na, ama naupa chu Azel a na:
chun, Azel chun naupasal paruk a nei a, an hminghai chu: Azrikam, Bokeru, Ismael, Searia, Obadia le Hanan hai an nih.
Chun, a unaupa Esek naupa- salhai chu a nau lutir Ulam, a pahnina Jeus, a pathumna Eliphelet a nih.
Chun, Ulam naupasalhai chu mi hrât khawkhêng, thal kâp mihai an na, naupasal tamtak an nei a, an naupasalhai naupasalhai leh za le sâwmnga an nih. Hienghai po po hi Benjamin naupasalhai chu an nih.
